features: Premium Glassmorphism UI with Dynamic Base-Based Themes

description.es: Potente calculadora multibase de escritorio diseñada para estudiantes y entusiastas. Combina un motor matemático optimizado con trazado de pasos educativos, arquitectura asíncrona mediante Web Workers y una interfaz premium con estética Glassmorphism.
description.en: Powerful desktop multibase calculator designed for students and enthusiasts. It combines an optimized mathematical engine with educational step-tracing, asynchronous architecture via Web Workers, and a premium Glassmorphism UI.
